org.javamoney.cdi.api

Annotation Type AmountSpec


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Documented
public @interface AmountSpec
    Annotation that allows to optionally refine a MonetaryAmountFactory, MonetaryAmount or MonetaryAmountFactoryQuery to be injected.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] attributes
      Any additional attributes in the form key=value.
      boolean fixedScale
      Should the amount created have always the same, fixed scale?
      int maxScale
      The maximum scale required.
      int precision
      The required precision.
      String[] providers
      The provider names.
      Class value
      The implemention type required, normally this does overrule all other settings.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Class value
        The implemention type required, normally this does overrule all other settings.
        Returns:
        the implementation type to be created by the factory.
        Default:
        javax.money.MonetaryAmount.class

      • fixedScale

        public abstract boolean fixedScale
        Should the amount created have always the same, fixed scale?
        Returns:
        the fixedScale flag.
        Default:
        false

      • maxScale

        public abstract int maxScale
        The maximum scale required.
        Returns:
        the maximum scale.
        Default:
        -1

      • precision

        public abstract int precision
        The required precision.
        Returns:
        the required precision.
        Default:
        -1

      • providers

        public abstract String[] providers
        The provider names.
        Returns:
        the provider names.
        Default:
        {}

      • attributes

        public abstract String[] attributes
        Any additional attributes in the form key=value.
        Returns:
        any addtiional attributes.
        Default:
        {}
